Name: Pomegranate Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This drink was originally based on gin but we find that juniper and pomegranate clash.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Lotus Bar in Sydney, Australia.
Nutrition: One serving of Pomegranate Cocktail contains 206 calories
